name: Lowlifer
description:
"Lowlifer" is a nightmare dystopian society open-world RPG where the player takes control of the main character who is forced to go against the system while finding real truth about the current nightmare that the world experiencing right now.
Gather your party all over the world, choose your favorite characters and fight your way for freedom of the whole human society.
Hardcore old school RPG adventure.
More than 40 hours of gameplay.
More than 15 characters to choose and modify party to your needs.
An atmosphere of the old-school RPG games like those on PS1.
Unbelievable lack of luck, funny moments, and much more...
